data.name: Stalker in black
data.detailed_description:
With ugly desires and the stench of malice, lurking in the dark streets of the late night waiting for prey.
Careful of the surroundings and clutter on the ground, creeping up on the target, looking for an opportunity.
Or strike viciously and subdue the target with violence.
After capturing the target and put it in your own lair with a variety of props and postures, seduction or torture, so that the prey finally succumbed to the body and mind to give.
Then start the next round of hunting ......

This game is entirely fantasy game, please do not imitate in reality.


Collect information

You need to follow the hints and complete the objectives to get information about your prey.

Careful hunting

Use the various props around you to attract the attention of the obstructors. Get the opportunity to move forward. Be sure to be careful of the prey may also hurt the hunter.

Enjoy the results

After the successful capture, you can enjoy the prey in the way you like.

data.short_description: Lurk in the darkness, track, capture, imprison, temper and take beautiful female bodies for yourself. This is a game to track and capture beautiful girls for conditioning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Corei3 2130 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 x64
  • Processor: i7 7700k
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, Violent sexual crimes Content.
